name: Kid Soundboard
description:
I made a toy for my baby since I got annoyed with the beepy-chirpy sounds of the existing toys.  Whenever the kid starts playing with buttons and rotating stuff  this one should work.

Warnings: You should supervise play as mine liked to eat and salivate into the thumbsticks at first. Also expect the kid to smash the controller into floor at times of intense exploration of how stuff works. Note: The triggers are connected to rumble, so expect battery drain.

I have tested it with PS4 and Xbox controller, but anything Unity has built support for should work with it. 

Esc to exit. Controller only.

Bugs: The controller should be attached to the computer before you start the toy. Disconnecting it afterwards is indicated.
